body.p: Your petitioners the subscribers would respectfully represent that the Honb. B. L. Clarke was the security for the personal appearance of his brother Branch Clarke at the term 18 of the McLean circuit court -- that the said Branch Clarke failed to appear in discharge of his bond & the said B. L Clarke, his only Security, made responsible for the amount of the said bond to wit $4000.The portion of the said bond viz $1200 due & owing to the Commonwealths' atty. has been secured to him. In view of the circumstances surrounding the Honb. B, L. Clarke in entering into the bond aforesaid & his pecuniary condition, we his old associates & friends respectfully pray your Excellency to remit said fine & forfeiture as to him

Wm V. Loving
B, C, Grider
A W Graham
J C Wilkins
J, R, Underwood
C W. Milliken
